body.name: SANSUI Monitor 22 Inch IPS 75Hz FHD 1080P HDMI VGA Ports Computer Monitor Ultra-Thin Tilt Adjustable VESA Mount Compatible with Eye Comfort 178° Wide Viewing Angle for Game and Office(ES-22X3)
features: Immersive Visual with IPS Panel - The 1920 1080P resolution monitor with IPS panel with 99.99 percent SRGB (72 percent NTSC) and 16.7M display colors create vivid and lifelike visuals. Three-sided edge-less design allows multiple monitor setups perfectly and ultra-slim profile make this monitor a stylish addition to any workplace or gaming setups.

HDMI and VGA Compatible-With HDMI cable can max the resolution to 1920x1080P at 75Hz and support Free Sync to reduce image tearing. VGA connection can swiftly display rich colors in dynamic scenes, like FPS or MOBA gaming, action movies, video meetings... making every action with no lags and blur. Via HDMI ports can quickly connect to various devices, like PC, laptops, TV boxes, game consoles, etc. Whether working or gaming, the SANSUI monitor can be a great assistance.

Eye-Comfortable-Low blue light with anti-flicker and anti-glare technology effectively reducing eye strain during prolonged use. The 178 degree wide viewing angle you can have a clear view from any perspective. VESA mount allows you to mount the monitor at a comfortable viewing height for optimal ergonomics. Also, the adjustable screen (-5 degree to 15 degree ) allows you to find a comfortable view for your eyes.

Easy Mount-The 22 inch monitor only needs two steps to mount for two metal parts of the stand. Just to assemble the two parts of stand, then button the monitor on the stand, you will get a well-mounting monitor easily. This assembled metal stand makes the monitor easy to mount and unmount. Support the 75×75 mm VESA mounting (screw hole: 2 holes with M4 x 8 mm), gives you more choices to set up the monitor.
After-sale Support-SANSUI offers a 30-day money-back guarantee and a 12-month warranty.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 810 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #4,355 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics) #140 in Computer Monitors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought to go with a new pc. No real assembly, other than mounting the base.I am not crazy about the power, HDMI cable placement. They plug into the bottom and hang straight down. I am a neat and picky person, and like to have all cords routed, dressed, and out of sight if possible. The way these are placed, they hang down from the bottom of the monitor, so it is impossible to get them out of sight. As I said, that is a personal peeve.The speakers are really bad, so just go ahead and buy some external speakers for it if you will use audio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this monitor. The image is clear and the sound isn’t bad for a monitor, not super loud like a tv with a built in sub would be, but good. Nintendo switch can hook right to it through the usb-c port flawlessly and pc gaming image is smooth as well through the hdmi. I like it and the price is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They function fine.
reviews.reviewText: They are bright enough and fairly light so they work with the monitor stand. They came with all the necessary parts and wires. My complaint is that they have those unnecessarily large plugs. You know, the ones that extend a bit too far in any direction so as to make any nearby outlets useless. I'm not a farmer. I shouldn't have to leave every other outlet fallow and rotate plugs every season. The wires are also 3 feet long. This is fine but considering I bought 2 monitors and plugging them in took some creative wiring, it was a second hassle.Another complaint I have is that the back of the monitor has places for 2 screws if you are hanging them on a stand. It works but I would rather have 4 holes so I could use all the screws and they looked more secure. Not really an issue but still not something I am happy about.Overall, they look and work fine although I don't know about audio. To be honest, when there is an input (I turn my computer on), there seems to be a 30 second delay before both monitors are on. Otherwise, they operate as expected with few interruptions or issues.Plus, inexpensive as hell. If they weren't, this would be 3 stars for the large plugs alone, but it's another case of getting what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does everything it says it does, and so easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for another second screen to use with my MacBook, and it was really challenging to find some thing that used the USB-C cable, but had a good size to it. Well this one takes the cake. It’s literally plug-in play and within five minutes I was up and running and my second screen works beautifully! The image is pretty clear it’s not the best I’ve ever seen, but honestly given the price it’s clearly the best on the market

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has a VGA connector.
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy that this unit had a VGA connector, most ones I looked at do not have one. It is just the right size for me, not too big or too small. Quality monitor at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Screen looks good especially at the price point. The speaker is terrible though so I added a small speaker and am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Price is the best part
reviews.reviewText: The colors are sharp and the image quality is really nice but it doesn’t blow you out of the water at all. It’s a budget monitor, which is why $64 is still a great deal for people getting into gaming. If you’re upgrading from your current 1080p60hz monitor, I would fork up the extra $20-40 it’ll cost you for something with a bit more bells and whistles like HDR, higher refresh rate, and a larger screen since this one is surprisingly small. It would be great for a small office space with a bit of recreational time to watch movies/videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good monitor for a low price
reviews.reviewText: This may not be the product for you if you care about a super high refresh rate or crisp image quality, but this monitor is great if you're looking for something cheap to use as a secondary monitor. I use this as a second monitor for working from home or for having youtube/discord open while gaming and it works great for that purpose. One thing to note though is that while this monitor is VESA mount compatible, it only has two spots for the screws. Not a problem when you're mounting horizontally, but I mounted this monitor vertically using a different stand than the one provided and this was definitely a surprise. Luckily, this isn't really a problem since the monitor is so lightweight, I'm not worried about it tipping over. Also, the color balance is a little off compared to my main monitor. It leans slightly pinkish almost. Again not really something that bothers me but something to note if you are a graphic designer or someone who cares a lot about that sort of thing.

This is a sharp and quality monitor, size is perfect for all my games and brightness are way more beautiful than my previous monitor. Sleek design is modern and beautiful.My new computer as new usb-c type port and that’s the first time I can try it with a monitor. This option works very well and cable were included in the box along with a HDMI cable. The quality of the frame is surprisingly very good with thin border. The 100hz makes a great difference on my games and they are more fluid and sharp than my previous monitor. The colors rendering is just amazing. 24’’ inch is also a perfect size for me and maybe I will add a second monitor for multitasking in the future. This monitor doesn’t feel cheap at all and for the price it’s an amazing value compare to big other brand. Another great feature is the built in speaker, great when I change room to play with my brothers. Those are small speakers so don’t expect to get home theater sound but sound is ok. Im my room I still prefer my detach speaker with subwoofer. I do some homework too with 3d software and with the vibrant color I see a big difference in texture. For now I used the provided stand on my desk but when I will buy another monitor I will use a duplex stand and this monitor is compatible with VESA mount, so no problem on using another mounting stand or fixing on wall. I’m not an expert at gaming, average user and part time homework user too and I can go wrong with this monitor, i’m very please with it.Plus :Great ValueNew usb type-C portBrightnessQualityThinLightweight100hzCons :None so far for my use

Monitor arrived quickly and well packaged. Stand was easy to assemble and seems sturdy once snapped into monitor. The on-screen menu is fairly simple but limited in options. Quite pleased with the video quality, and the speakers are adequate. Vesa mounting holes are only two. That's a bone headed decision from the designers. My after-market stand expects 4 holes and so do I. Over all this is pretty good value purchase.PS. cables shipped were C and HDMI. Had to buy my own DP cable for my Lenovo tower which has only VGA and PD.

The SANSUI 24-inch monitor delivers stunning visuals with its 100Hz refresh rate and vibrant IPS display. Easy setup with USB Type-C, crisp 1080P resolution, and surprisingly good built-in speakers make it a standout choice for work and entertainment. Recommended for those seeking a visually immersive computing experience!
Good monitor and a good price
